WorkItem.ClosedComment: 10 versions old, if this is still an issue please resubmit
WorkItem.Description: I've been using Rawr for a while now and just today I encountered an issue with the program closing when trying to save a character or when trying to load a previously saved character file.  I deleted all old files, reinstalled the program, and the issue persists.  There are no error messages popping up, just closes down and disappears.  Anyone familiar with this problem?
WorkItem.Summary: Program closes when saving or loading.

Comments.Message: Haven't seen or heard of that one before... Perhaps some sort of virus protection? Or disk access permissions? Try moving Rawr somewhere you know you have full permissions, and using Right Click>Run as Administrator?

I am the sole user and administrator on my computer and have full permissions.  I disabled antivirus and it still closes on me.  I downloaded the new version (2.2.3) and it is behaving in a similar fashion.  I cannot load my character from the armory without it closing the program and it closes if I change the model from Bear to Cat.

Need some information to try to reproduce:
OS and service pack
Version of .NET framework
Language
Location of install and saved files
and attach a zip of your saved files to this defect.

Thank you.
I'll load it up in a VM or ghost test image and see what I can find.
The issue may be virus related.  I'm trying to clean up one that has surfaced recently and I'll see if the issue is resolved once I'm confident the virus is removed.
